description: Detect lateral movement using GPO scheduled task, usually used to deploy ransomware at scale Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: if the source IP is not localhost then it's super suspicious, better to monitor both local and remote changes to GPO scheduledtasks
name: Persistence and Execution at Scale via GPO Scheduled Task
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\SYSVOL AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:*ScheduledTasks.xml AND Accesses:(*WriteData* OR *%%4417*))
